436515 THE RAILWAYS (AMENDMENT) ACT, 2003
NO. 56 OF 2003 [ 30th December, 2003.]
An act further to amend the Railways Act, 1989.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- fourth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
655876 1 Short title and commencement.-
399521 1This Act may be called the Railways (Amendment) Act, 2003.
1057938 2It shall come into force on such date as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.
1671080 2Amendment of section 137.- In section 137 of the Railways Act, 1989 (24 of 1989) (hereinafter referred to as the principal Act), in sub- section (3), for the words" fifty rupees", the words" two hundred and fifty rupees" shall be substituted.
1908310 3Amendment of section 138.- In section 138 of the principal Act, in sub- section (3), for the words" fifty rupees", the words" two hundred and fifty rupees" shall be substituted. T. K. VISWANATHAN,
Secy. to the Govt. of India.
